whyUs.title: Why client
whyUs.description: We provide tailored solutions built on creativity, precision, and trust—ensuring quality results and a smooth experience every step of the way.

satisfaction.label: Client satisfaction rate, fostering long-term relationships and repeat business

apps.title: Apps
apps.tagline: Native and cross-platform mobile applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.
apps.description1: We build mobile applications that users love. From concept to App Store, we handle the entire development process. Our apps are built with performance, scalability, and user experience at the core.
apps.description2: Whether you need an iOS app, Android app, or a cross-platform solution that works on both, we have the expertise to deliver. We specialize in React Native for efficient cross-platform development without sacrificing native performance.

simnetiq.name: Simnetiq
simnetiq.description: Global eSIM application for travelers. Buy and activate eSIMs instantly for 190+ countries. Built with React Native for iOS and Android.

goDelivery.name: Go Delivery
goDelivery.description: Delivery service application for seamless order tracking and management. Built with React Native for iOS and Android.

montiVpn.name: Monti VPN
montiVpn.description: Secure VPN application for private and protected internet browsing. Built with React Native for iOS and Android.

roamjet.name: RoamJet eSIM
roamjet.description: eSIM travel companion for instant mobile connectivity worldwide. Built with React Native for iOS and Android.

vitrix.name: Vitrix
vitrix.description: Fitness and workout tracking application for achieving your health goals. Built with React Native for Android.

branndi.name: Branndi
branndi.description: Brand management and social media toolkit for creators and businesses. Built with React Native for iOS and Android.

plugiq.name: PlugIQ
plugiq.description: Smart EV charging station finder and management application. Built with React Native for iOS.

web.title: Web
web.tagline: Modern web applications and landing pages that convert visitors into customers.
web.description1: We create stunning web experiences that drive results. From high-converting landing pages to complex web applications, we build solutions that look great and perform even better.
web.description2: Using the latest technologies like Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS, we deliver fast, SEO-friendly websites that scale with your business.

automations.title: Automations
automations.tagline: Streamline your workflows and eliminate repetitive tasks with intelligent automation.
automations.description1: We automate your business processes to save time and reduce errors. From simple task automation to complex multi-system integrations, we build workflows that work 24/7.
automations.description2: Using platforms like n8n and Make, we connect your tools and create seamless automations that scale with your business needs.

marketing.title: Ads & Marketing
marketing.tagline: Strategic marketing campaigns that reach the right audience and drive real results.
marketing.description1: We create and manage marketing campaigns that deliver measurable results. From social media ads to search engine marketing, we help you reach your target audience effectively.
marketing.description2: Our data-driven approach ensures every dollar spent contributes to your growth goals.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: HolyLabs ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

informationCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollect.intro: We may collect information about you in various ways:
items: Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact information you provide when contacting us.
Usage Data: Information about how you use our website, including pages visited, time spent, and navigation patterns.
Device Data: Information about your device, browser type, IP address, and operating system.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
Improve our website and services
Send you updates about our services (with your consent)
Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience
Comply with legal obligations

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With service providers who assist us in operating our website
To comply with legal requirements or respond to lawful requests
To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Access the personal information we hold about you
Request correction of inaccurate information
Request deletion of your personal information
Withdraw consent for data processing
Object to certain processing activities

contactUs.title: 7. Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
items: Remember your preferences and settings
Analyze how our website is used
Improve our website performance
Provide personalized content

typesOfCookies.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
items: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly.
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences.

managingCookies.title: 4. Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

contactUs.title: 5. Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:
